name: John A.
testimony: “Great services, I was in and out in no time at all!”

name: Kiara J
testimony: “I got a health screening at the clinic and it was really professional, they treated me with kindness, respect, and it didn't take long at all.”

name: Mary Kay
testimony: “I can't say enough good things or recommend Al at Gee's Clipper Barbershop enough. My oldest kiddo has sensory issues & the biggest one is around his head. Getting his hair cut ever since he's been 1 has always been a battle. Al was so patient with my big boy - he was calm and just talking to him & his persistence was magic. Grateful and both my boys look so handsome.”

name: Steve W
testimony: “The entire shop and group of people are good. They make you feel welcomed when you enter and thank you once you leave. Of course they do a great job and are priced accordingly.”

name: Anonymous
testimony: “I gained valuable coping techniques during my participation in Real Men Real Talk. These strategies have proven instrumental in managing my stress and anxiety related to relocating to a new city as an African American male.”

name: Anonymous
testimony: “Barber showed up late to my appointment and then cut someone before me.”

name: Michael
testimony: “My son got to meet some brewers players today and he got to get a signed baseball! I love Gee's Clippers.”

name: Lucy
testimony: “I'm tuning in every week to hear Gee's podacast.”

name: Lucas
testimony: “I met some politicians at the shop today & was able to discuss things effecting the community.”
“Loved hearing about other's stories at Real Men Real Talk and the food was great.”
name: Derrick

testimony: “I loved going to real men real talk”
name: Derrick
